title: Beirut Oh Beirut
cast: Ezzat El Alaily, Mireille Maalouf, Joseph Bou Nassar, Elie Adabachi, Philippe Akiki, Ahmed Al Zein
description: In the aftermath of the 1967 Arab-Israeli War, four young Lebanese navigate their existence along rapidly transforming political lines.

title: Chupke Chupke
cast: Dharmendra, Sharmila Tagore, Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bhaduri, Om Prakash, Asrani, David Abraham, Usha Kiran, Lily Chakravarty, Keshto Mukherjee
description: Jealous of the high regard in which his new wife holds their brother-in-law, a botany professor stages an elaborate prank that will even the score.

title: Hotel Pacific
cast: Marek Kondrat, Roman Wilhelmi, Roman Skamene, Čestmír Řanda, Michał Pawlicki, Martin Hron, Stanisława Celińska, Joanna Kasperska, Jaroslava Schallerová
description: A motivated teen strives to rise from dishwasher to waiter at a luxury hotel only to tread in the abusive tide of its workplace hierarchy.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
cast: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Gilliam, Terry Jones, Michael Palin, Connie Booth, Carol Cleveland, Neil Innes
description: The Monty Python comedy clan skewers King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table as they quest far and wide for the Holy Grail.

title: Salaakhen
cast: Shashi Kapoor, Sulakshana Pandit, Mehmood, Sudhir, Anjana Mumtaz, Sajjan, M. Rajan, Mac Mohan, Amrish Puri, Ramesh Deo
listed_in: Action & Adventure, International Movies, Music & Musicals
description: Two close childhood friends take drastically different paths in life, but meet by chance years later and fall in love, unaware of their past bond.

title: The Flying Guillotine
cast: Kuan Tai Chen, Feng Ku, Hung Wei, Wu Chi Liu, Yang Chiang
description: In Qing-dynasty China, the emperor commands that a weapon be invented to kill at a distance without a trace. Then he orders it used on its wielders.
